devdoc.author: Jourdan Dunkley <jourdan@ionic.money>
devdoc.details: This contract allows staking and claiming rewards with a specific staking strategy.The staking strategy is set during contract deployment and can only be called by the strategy.The contract is designed to be used with the Velodrome/Aerodrome style LP.

Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

initialize(address).details: Can only be called once due to initializer modifier

params._stakeStrategy: The address of the staking strategy contract

params.amount: The amount of tokens to stake.
params.data: Additional data required for the staking strategy.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to withdraw.
params.withdrawTo: The address to withdraw tokens to.

devdoc.title: VeloAeroStakingWallet

initialize(address).notice: Initializes the contract with a staking strategy

stake(address,uint256,bytes).notice: Stakes a specified amount of tokens according to the strategy.

withdraw(address,uint256).notice: Withdraws a specified amount of staked tokens.

userdoc.notice: Staking interface for usage in veION when staking Velodrome/Aerodrome style LP.
